title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 390.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 390.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to provide for the
participation by the Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation as a
member of the Council of Contracting Agencies (the council) established by

Executive Order No. 125, dated May 22, 1989, in order to enhance the
availability of and access to information relevant to the statutory
determination by the various contracting agencies of the responsibility and
reliability of low bidders for the award of construction contracts and certain
service contracts and the approval of subcontractors relative to such
contracts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
390.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
